somethingWentWrong.title: SOMETHING WENT WRONG
somethingWentWrong.description: Relax, you didn't break the internet. You may try refreshing the page.

notFound.title: PAGE NOT FOUND
notFound.description: Couldn't find that. Try something else or go back home.

label.success: Your password has been reset. If you didn't request this, please contact our support team immediately.
label.title: Password Reset Successful

validationInfo.charCount: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validationInfo.uppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
validationInfo.lowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
validationInfo.symbol: Password must contain one of the following symbols (#$-_!)
validationInfo.match: New password and confirm new password must match.

label.enterUsername: Please enter your username or email.
label.link: A link will be sent to your email in order for you to reset your password.
